location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Colonel William Cowper, Commissary General at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a descriptive roll of horses shipped on the bugulah [bughla] Elizaunder Noquadah [Nakhoda] Cojea Matook and discusses shipping arrangements. The horses are for the 17th regiment, with further horses to follow on the Country Ship Eliza.
